hero.description: Simplicity First, No Bloat. A modern admin framework based on Spring Boot 3 and Vben Admin 5. The lightweight foundation for your new projects.

cta.title: Ready to build your admin system?
cta.subtitle: Start using Tagtag today.
cta.description: Get started with Tagtag today and build robust enterprise applications with ease.

quick_start.title: Quick Start
quick_start.subtitle: Get up and running in minutes.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build admin systems
features.description: Tagtag provides a robust foundation for your enterprise applications, allowing you to focus on business logic.

modular.title: Modular Architecture
modular.description: Strictly layered design with common, framework, kernel, contract, and module. Decoupled and maintainable.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready
enterprise.description: Built-in RBAC, Operation Logs, and Rate Limiting.

contract.title: Contract First
contract.description: Clear separation of API definitions and implementations using DTOs and Interfaces.

modern.title: Modern Stack
modern.description: Built on Spring Boot 3, MyBatis Plus, and Redis, integrated with Vben Admin (Vue 3).

integrations.title: System Modules
integrations.description: Built-in Dictionary, Configuration, and Notification modules.

dx.title: Developer Experience
dx.description: Standardized error handling, response wrapping, and utility libraries.
